description.value:
Half a Dozen Small Clockwork Scorpions Data-Linked to a Screamer. The Screamer is buried on the edge of a camp. When triggered, it silently sends a message to these Camp Warders which act to frighten and cause mild but not damaging pain to herd away intruders. Creatures with the Bestial Trait make a -20 Willpower Test or flee.

Requirements

Cost includes a Modified Screamer and 6 Camp Warders (Screamer: set via a Tech-Use Test, has perception 75, see profile for full info)

Effect: Rare

Notes: 310 T
